Translations.Text: Tunc Feria Resurrection He disgrace them ask Ubi est My partners vos set Me opposed Me pro their causa? Those beatus cum knowledge dictus Hodie shame misery befallen disbelievers
angels put them decessus dictus de wronging their anima! Est when they tandem submit dictus Nos non perfecit anything wrong Sic indeed! DEUS EST fully aware de everything VOS PERFECIT
Ergo iniit gates Hell wherein vos abide forever Quod miserable destiny pro arrogant unus

Prout pro righteous when they asked Quod perfecit vos think de these revelations ex tuus Dominus they dictus Bonus. those lead righteous vita happiness; abode Hereafter est et bonus! Quod blissful abode pro the righteous
gardens Eden reserved them wherein rivers flow They habet anything they wish therein. DEUS SIC rewards the righteous
angels terminate their vita in dictus righteousness dictus Pax est vos! Iniit Paradise (statim) prout reward tuus works
they waiting angels est advenit them alias tuus Dominus judgment advenit pass Those ante them perfecit same thing! DEUS EST UNUS wronged them; they est UNUS wronged their suus ANIMA
They incurred consequences their malus works very things they ridiculed advenit haunt them
